item.title: Psychology Sem IV modules
item.description: MODULE I: INTRODUCTION TO LIFE-SPAN DEVELOPMENT a) Concept of human development and Life-span perspective b) Patterns of change and development: Normative and Ideographic c) Characteristics and Principles of Development d) Key issues in life-span perspective: Nature v/s Nurture, Continuity v/s Discontinuity, Activity v/s Passivity, Specificity v/s Generality e) Types of developmental research designs: Cross-sectional design, Longitudinal design, Sequential design, , Case Study method, Ethnography, Cohort Design
